statements: DELETE FROM WaterUsageRestrictions WHERE restriction_level = 2 AND government_id = 5;
DELETE FROM WaterUsageRestrictions WHERE restriction_level > 2 AND government_id = 5;
DELETE FROM water_restrictions WHERE location_id = 100 AND restriction_type = 'permanent';
DELETE FROM water_restrictions WHERE location_id = 1 AND start_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM water_usage WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-28' AND usage_amount > 1000.00;
DELETE FROM WaterAuthorities WHERE region = 'South' AND authority_name = 'South Authority';
